title: A new upper bound on Ruzsa's number on the Erd\H os-Tur√°n conjecture
abstract: In this note, we show that the Ruzsa number $R_m$ is bounded by $192$ for any positive integer $m$, which improved the prior bound $R_m\le 288$ given by Y.--G. Chen in 2008.
comment: We make up some gaps pointed out by Professor Yong--Gao Chen
